TEACHERS COLLEGE
COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY
NEW YORK 27, N. Y.
HORACE MANN-LINCOLN
INSTITUTE OF SCHOOL
EXPERIMENTATION
March 5, 1958
Professor Sam Becker
Director, Television Center
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Professor Becker:
Dr* I* Keith Tyler has sent Dr. Foshay the
first draft of the Seminar on Research in Educational
Broadcasting report for his suggestions and correcÂ¬
tions. Since Dr. Foshay will be out of town through
March 20, I am forwarding this material to him. You
may be hearing from him shortly.
Sincere3y yours.
(Mrs.) Grace Smith
Secretaiy to Dr. A. W. Foshay
cc to Dr. I. Keith Tyler
